Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are excited to offer you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $750000. We believe this is a fair and generous offer, considering the unparalleled quality and unique features of the product. We look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this exceptional piece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
